subject: Attention
body:
Attention
Sir
How are you?
iam  Barrsiter  charles williams   appointed to supervise  and release all over due fund  this jan 2024 that have  not received there fund in which your is among.
once more very sorry for the past experance and delayed.
your fund have been released  , cross check and confirm receipt of your released fund  as to avoid
wrong receipt. once more  very sorry and confirm. congratulations
always reply to ; 
esqhumanright@gmail.com
sincerely
Charles williams  Esq

subject: Re:   Attention
body:
Hello Barrister Charles Williams,

I hope this message finds you well. Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the release of my overdue funds. I appreciate your apology for any past experiences and delays that may have occurred.

Could you please provide me with more details about the fund that has been released? I would like to ensure that everything is in order before confirming the receipt. Additionally, could you clarify how I can confirm the receipt of the funds?

Thank you once again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Gena

subject: Re: Attention
body:
Attention Denis

sir

iam sorry for late response because your release compersation fund of
950.000.00 usd only  released  to you did not conflect due to  erro in the
accident and  that was why  it did not go through.

we sorry and request you reconfirm your receiving bank account details with
mailing address and  private phone number and attach id as  to enable bank
issues half of your fund  atm card  and  release to you while balance by
bank transfer and confirmable payment slip giving to you.

 once very sorry whhile awaits
sincerely
Esq Charles

subject: Re: Awaits
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the update regarding my release fund. Could you please provide more details on how to proceed with reconfirming my bank account details and the process for receiving the ATM card? I want to make sure everything is in order before moving forward.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Gena

subject: Re: from charles
body:
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the update regarding the release of my funds. Could you please provide more details on how to proceed with confirming my bank account information and ID for the fund transfer? I want to ensure everything is in order before proceeding. Thank you.

Best wishes,
Gena

subject: Re: Attention
body:
Hello Denis,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the update regarding the release of my funds. Could you please provide more details on how to proceed with reconfirming my bank account details and providing the necessary information for the issuance of the ATM card? I want to ensure that everything is in order before moving forward.

Looking forward to your response.

subject: Reconfirm
body:
your mail is well noted,

pleases reconfirm your receiving bank account details / receiving mailing
address and attach your identification and reconfirm your mailing address
your atm is ready for collection.
awaits
charles

subject: Re: Reconfirm
body:
Hello Charles, thank you for your message. I would be happy to provide the information you requested. Could you please share more details about the ATM and how I can proceed with receiving it?

Best wishes,
Gena

subject: Re: Reconfirm
body:
Sir

you will either come  in person to collect it or it will be sent to you.
awaits the information
charles
